Plot: Mohamed lives in Nouadhibou, in Mauritania. But he can always see the ghost of his former town in front of his eyes. Aalien, the postman, fled to refugee camps in Tindouf, Algeria. But he's...
Title: La Guera, my forgotten land
Country: Italy, Algeria, Mauritania, Spain, Western Sahara
Actors: Mamia Abba, Mohamed Alewa, Abdellahi Bucheiba, Zeinabu Buna Meguey
